title: Networks of Spiking Neurons: The Third Generation of Neural Network Models

tldr.text: It is shown that networks of spiking neurons are, with regard to the number of neurons that are needed, computationally more powerful than these other neural network models based on McCulloch Pitts neurons, respectively, sigmoidal gates.
